name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Re;Birth2: Additional Content Pack 3
summary:
This DLC will add the following items:
・Change Dungeon: Iris Field
・Plan: Shining Ring
・Plan: Black Cat Ring
・Plan: Round Ring
・Plan: U Ring

It will also add the following content:
・Increase the level cap by 300
・A new Colosseum battle is available
